naslov: KUĆA S 3 STANA I PREDIVNIM POGLEDOM (prodaja)
opis: IZVRSNA PRILIKA!!!! KUĆA S 3 STANA I PREDIVNIM POGLEDOM Kontakt podaci +385 91 534 9959 ili mail: t.tomic@remax.hr (Tonka) Posredujemo u prodaji kuće na obroncima Mosora, u malom mjestu Srinjine. Kuća je smještena na parceli od 2500 m2 i brutto površine je 313 m2. Proteže se na 4 etaže, suteren, prizemlje, prvi kat i visoko potkrovlje. U suterenu je spremište od cca 40 m2, a na ostale tri etaže su odvojene stambene jedinice. Stambena površina iznosi 250 m2. Uz kuću se nalazi još jedan natkriveni prostor. Stan u visokom potkrovlju je uređen i useljiv, a sastoji se od ulaznog hodnika, kuhinje s blagovaonicom, dnevnog boravka, kupaonice i dvije sobe. Cijelom južnom stranom se proteže balkon a sa strane ima i terasu s odrinom. Ostale jedinice treba dovršiti.Postavljeni su svi zatvori. Kuća je spojena na vodovod, a ima i bunar. Dovedena je i kanalizacija na koju treba spojiti kuću. Do kuće vodi asfaltni put. Parking ima više (cca 8) parkirnih mjesta Uz kuću su napravljeni terasasti vrtovi, a većina zemlje se nalazi ispred kuće. Na zemljištu se može napraviti i bazen pa uživati u  predivnom pogledu koji se pruža sa svih etaža kuće. Udaljenost od Splita i Omiša  je 15 km, a do obližnjih plaža ima 5 minuta vožnje. U Srinjinama se nalaze dućan i škola. Kuća je pogodna i za život i za bavljenje turizmom. Prodaje se po cijeni od 299.000,00 €. Kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju. Dodatne informacije o nekretnini, njezinoj točnoj lokaciji i razgledavanje mogući su nakon potpisivanja Ugovora o posredovanju s Agencijom koji je u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonom o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Kontakt podaci +385 91 534 9959 ili mail: t.tomic@remax.hr (Tonka) GREAT OPPORTUNITY !!!! HOUSE WITH 3 APARTMENTS AND BEAUTIFUL VIEW Contact information +385 91 534 9959 or mail: t.tomic@remax.hr (Tonka) We are selling a house on the slopes of Mosor, in the small village of Srinjine. The house is located on a plot of 2500 m2 and the gross area is 313 m2. It spreads over 4 floors, basement, ground floor, first floor and high attic. In the basement is a storage room of approximately 40 m2, and on the other three floors are separate residential units. Living area is 250 m2. Next to the house there is another covered space. The apartment in the high attic is decorated and ready to move in, and consists of an entrance hall, kitchen with dining area, living room, bathroom and two bedrooms. The entire south side has a balcony and the side has a terrace with a staircase. Other units need to be completed. All windows and doors have been installed. The house is connected to the water supply and has a well. A sewer has also been brought to connect the house. An asphalt road leads to the house. Parking has more (approx. 8) parking spaces There are terraced gardens next to the house, and most of the land is in front of the house. You can make a pool on the land and enjoy the beautiful view that extends from all floors of the house. Distance from Split and Omis is 15 km, and the nearby beaches are 5 minutes drive. There is a shop and a school in Srinjine. The house is suitable for living and tourism. It is for sale at a price of € 299,000.00. The buyer pays an agency commission. Additional information about the real estate, its exact location and sightseeing is possible after signing the Brokerage Agreement with the Agency, which is in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Real Estate Brokerage Act. Contact information +385 91 534 9959 or mail: t.tomic@remax.hr (Tonka)
